item.title: How to use Calendar in Java
item.description:
There is a great confusion between Calendar class and GregorianCalendar class. Let us look into these classes in detail.  These classes are for providing the standard calendar for world.

Calendar Class is an Abstract Class

**Package : **java.util.Calendar

**Extends : **Object class

item.title: How to use SimpleDateFormat in Java
item.description:
**Package : **java.text.SimpleDateFormat

**Extends : **DateFormat class (java.text.DateFormat class extends java.text.Format, java.text.Format extends java.lang.Object)

**Implements : **Serializable Interface, Cloneable Interface.
